overview: Frivolous young Marie de Severac is frightened into following a more virtuous path, when her father relates a story in which an equally frivolous woman is entombed alive. The movie was Rex Ingramâ€™s directorial debut, and he later remade the film as Trifling Women in 1922. Black Orchids is considered to be a lost film.
tagline: The Love Affairs of a Heartless Woman
title: Black Orchids
